diyunuwata path wu singappuruwe meya kriyathmaka we. 2.danata lankawe pawathina nithi wala adupadu sakas kara ema nithi samadenatama samanathmathawayen kriyathmaka kirima sadaha kramawedayak sakas karanna. 3.rajya sewayen uparima karyakshamathawaya laba ganima sadaha wada eekaka agayima matha gewimak sidu kala haki kramawedayak sakas karanna. 4.lankawe apanayanaya karana dewal niyamanayakata lakkara amudrawya washayen apanayanaya kirima sima kara nishpadana sidukara agaya ekathu kirima magin wadi widesha winimayak laba gatha haki kramawedayak sakas karanna.
ee diyunuwath ekak wena wenaswim walata ,abhiyogawalata awasthawan jayaganna awashya tharuna aakalpa ha awasthawan godanagima api aarambha karanna oona.
